author: Staff Reporter
text:
The buses that were involved in an accident at Shoolagiri.

Six persons were injured in a collision between two buses here on Shoolagiri highway on Monday.

A Karnataka State Transport Corporation bus bound to Melmaruvathur with pilgrims had stopped near Dakshina Tirupati in Shoolagiri briefly, and was returning to the highway at the time of the collision. According to sources, a private bus bound to Bengaluru sped along the highway, when it rammed the KSTC bus that was making a U-turn from the temple.

Among those injured, the cleaner of the Volvo bus is reportedly critical. The injured were rushed to Hosur government hospital and a private hospital in Bengaluru.
title: Six hurt as two buses collide
